CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 菜肴；盘子；碟；一道菜；轮盘；（天线的）碟形反射器
将（食物）盛于盘中；彻底击败；挫败；战胜；使成碟状；随意分发；批评；惩罚；传播八卦；分享消息；使某人不能成功

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指供个人分菜食用的盘子。

word_group.brief_definition: 皮氏培养皿，陪替氏培养皿

word_group.phrase: revenge is a dish best served cold
revenge is a dish best eaten cold

bilingual.target: 海鲜饭是西班牙著名的菜肴。

bilingual.source: The teachers have asked everyone to prepare a traditional dish.
bilingual.target: 老师们要求每个人准备一道传统菜肴。

bilingual.source: The teachers have asked everyone to prepare a traditional dish from their home country.
bilingual.target: 老师让每个人准备一道自己国家的传统菜肴。
你最喜欢的菜肴是什么？
这道菜肴是用鸡肉做的。
这是一道传统的中国菜肴。

bilingual.source: Onion can add more flavor to the dish.
bilingual.target: 圆葱可以让菜肴更有风味。

bilingual.source: The chef pours the sauce over the dish.
bilingual.target: 厨师将酱汁倒出在菜肴上。
这道菜肴需要很多种香料。

list.abstract: dish，英文单词，名词、及物动词、不及物动词，作名词时意为“盘；餐具；一盘食物；外貌有吸引力的人”，作及物动词时意为“盛于碟盘中；分发；使某人的希望破灭；说（某人）的闲话”，作不及物动词时意为“成碟状；闲谈”。

yingyinNormal.en: One great dish that always reminds me of family gatherings is Lion Head meatballs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 经常让我想起家人团聚的美味菜肴就是狮子头。

yingyinNormal.en: My special ingredient for this dish is Chinese beer. This is really going to add a delicious sweetness and really compliment the sea bass.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我做这道菜的秘密材料是中国啤酒，这会给菜肴带来一种美妙的甜味，很能衬托海鲈鱼的味道。

yingyinNormal.en: And you can use any other cooking wine, but I love Shao Hsing, from the Shao Hsing region in China. Just gives this gorgeous, bitter-sweet edge to any dish, and it just takes the rawness of meat or fish, and any odours off meat and fish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也可以使用其他料酒，但我爱用绍兴，中国绍兴地区产的绍兴米酒，可以让菜肴变得鲜美，苦中带甜，而且可以令肉或鱼更加入味，还能去除肉的腥味。

yingyinNormal.en: OK, great, so ready to dish up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，可以出锅了。

yingyinNormal.en: So really, two stir fries in one dish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一盘菜，两道小炒。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, everyone seems to like your dish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家都很喜欢你做的菜。

yingyinNormal.en: If you can't take it, Bernard, don't dish it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 己所不欲，勿施于人，伯纳德。

yingyinNormal.en: This is my fresh modern version of that peasant dish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就是我的现代版的农民餐。

yingyinNormal.en: Who's sending this debasing dish? I have a feeling...
yingyinNormal.zh: 是谁在恶意中伤呢？我感觉...

yingyinNormal.en: Now this dish wouldn't be complete without fresh orange segments.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这道菜不可或缺的是几瓣鲜橙。

yingyinNormal.en: And if you order the first dish in column A, you can't order the corresponding dish in column B.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你点了A栏里的第一道菜，你就不能点B栏里的第一道菜了。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you doing? You know I can only dish it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在干嘛？你知道我们会斗个没完的。

yingyinNormal.en: The lights flash and the dish spins. you want to try it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 灯会一闪一闪，托盘还会转，你想不想试试？

yingyinNormal.en: And these are all the pieces that are going into the dish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些是所有要烧进菜里的虾肉。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, the way you choose to eat this dish is really up to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这道菜的吃法随你喜欢。

yingyinNormal.en: And the next dish I'm going to make is my dragon prawn noodles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下一道菜是龙虾面条。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going to show you how to make this dish, my sweet and sour pork.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要向你们介绍咕噜肉的做法。

yingyinNormal.en: You actually think this is you, Nana? It is me, dear. Wasn't I a dish?
yingyinNormal.zh: 奶奶，你真的认为这是你吗? 这当然是我，亲爱的，我那时很美吧?

yingyinNormal.en: The first street-food dish, my version of egg fu yung, or savoury egg roll.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一道街头小吃，我改良的芙蓉蛋，也就是咸蛋卷。

yingyinNormal.en: Mason, please, don't leave me that dirty dish to wash. I do dishes all day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 梅森，求你了，别把那个脏盘子留给我来洗。我整天都在洗盘子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: all the items that have been used in the preparation, serving, and eating of a meal
the food contained or served in a dish; a particular variety or preparation of food served as part of a meal
information which is not generally known or available
utterly destroy, confound, or defeat someone or something

exam_freq_info.chinese: (装)盘; 碟; 器皿; 碟状物

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the food contained or served in a dish; a particular variety or preparation of food served as part of a meal

examination_example.sentence: "Traditional diets" in countries like India include little red meat, which might be consumed only on special occasions or as minor ingredients in mixed <highlight>dishes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 印度等国家的“传统饮食”包括很少的红肉，可能只在特殊场合或作为混合菜肴的小配料食用。

examination_example.sentence: The varieties of rice that can withstand the increasing salinity without losing the absorbency that makes European rice ideal for traditional Spanish and Italian <highlight>dishes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些品种的大米可以抵御不断增加的盐度，同时又不丧失吸收能力，这种吸收能力使欧洲大米成为传统西班牙和意大利菜的理想选择。

sense_info_list.zh: (装)盘; 碟; 器皿; 碟状物

word_usage.usage: dish作“餐具”时，总是用复数形式dishes，其前常加the。比如wash (up) the dishes 洗盘子。
dish还可作“一道菜”，可数。如 a dish of fish 一道鱼、have the dishes 吃菜。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (装)盘; 碟; 器皿; 碟状物

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the food contained or served in a dish; a particular variety or preparation of food served as part of a meal

examination_example.sentence: He also perfected the soufflé-a baked egg <highlight>dish</highlight>, and introduced the standard chef's uniform-the same double-breasted white coat and tall white hat still worn by many chefs today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他还完善了舒芙蕾鸡蛋烤盘，并介绍了标准厨师的制服——如今许多厨师仍穿着同样的双排扣白大衣和高大的白帽子。

examination_example.sentence: In his short lifetime, which ended exactly 184 years ago today, he would forever revolutionize French gourmet food (美食) , write best-selling cook books and think up magical <highlight>dishes</highlight> for royals and other important people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在他短暂的一生中(距今184年前才结束)，他将永远改变法国的美食，写最畅销的烹饪书，并为皇室成员和其他重要人物制作神奇的菜肴。

sense_info_list.zh: (装)盘; 碟; 器皿; 碟状物

word_usage.usage: dish还可作“一道菜”，可数。如 a dish of fish 一道鱼、have the dishes 吃菜。
dish作“餐具”时，总是用复数形式dishes，其前常加the。比如wash (up) the dishes 洗盘子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the food contained or served in a dish; a particular variety or preparation of food served as part of a meal

examination_example.sentence_trans: 它提供了许多美味的菜肴。

examination_example.sentence: There are quite a lot of delicious <highlight>dishes</highlight> to choose from.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有很多美味的菜肴可供选择。

examination_example.sentence: I always assist my parents in doing the <highlight>dishes</highlight> after meals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我总是在饭后帮父母洗碗。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (装)盘; 碟; 碟状物; 凹形容器; 抛物面天线

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the food contained or served in a dish; a particular variety or preparation of food served as part of a meal

examination_example.sentence: Now over the years, real Chinese <highlight>dishes</highlight> have become more and more popular in foreign countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些年来，正宗的中国菜在国外越来越受欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: She makes me all kinds of traditional Chinese <highlight>dishes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她给我做了各种各样的中国传统菜肴。

examination_example.sentence: Once <highlight>dishes</highlight> come, we take out our mobile phones and take photos instead of lifting our chopsticks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦菜来了，我们就拿出手机拍照，而不是拿起筷子。

sense_info_list.en: all the items that have been used in the preparation, serving, and eating of a meal

examination_example.sentence: They might have to do some housework to get pocket money, including cleaning, cooking, washing <highlight>dishes</highlight> and so on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们也许不得不做一些家务来获取零花钱，包括打扫卫生、做饭、洗碗等等。

examination_example.sentence: Worst of all, they make me wash my own <highlight>dishes</highlight> and bathe myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最糟糕的是，他们让我自己洗碗，自己洗澡。

sense_info_list.zh: (装)盘; 碟; 碟状物; 凹形容器; 抛物面天线

examination_example.sentence: Most antennas are made in the shape of a <highlight>dish</highlight> to collect and reflect, the radio waves to the sub-reflector.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数天线做成碟形，用来收集和反射无线电波到副反射器。

examination_example.sentence: Most antennas of radio telescopes are made in the shape of a <highlight>dish</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数射电望远镜的天线都做成碟形。

examination_example.sentence: The bigger <highlight>dish</highlight> will be able to pick up weaker signals (信号).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 较大的天线盘能够接收到较弱的信号。

word_usage.usage: dish作“餐具”时，总是用复数形式dishes，其前常加the。比如wash (up) the dishes 洗盘子。
dish还可作“一道菜”，可数。如 a dish of fish 一道鱼、have the dishes 吃菜。
